description: Indulge in the rich and creamy flavors of this homemade peppermint hot cocoa that rivals your favorite coffee shop. Perfectly sweetened and topped with whipped cream, it's a cozy treat for any occasion.
instructions: In a saucepan, combine milk, heavy cream, cocoa powder, and sugar over medium heat.
Whisk until the mixture is smooth and heated through, about 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in peppermint extract.
Serve in mugs topped with whipped cream and crushed peppermint candies.
tips: For an extra rich flavor, use dark chocolate cocoa powder. Adjust the peppermint extract to taste for a more or less intense mint flavor.

structured_content.content: This peppermint hot cocoa is a delightful twist on a classic winter drink. The combination of creamy milk and rich cocoa, enhanced with a hint of peppermint, creates a cozy beverage that warms you from the inside out. Perfect for holiday gatherings or a quiet night in, this recipe is sure to become a seasonal favorite.

note.label: Why You'll Love This Recipe
note.content:
• Quick and easy to make in under 30 minutes
  • Rich, creamy texture that rivals coffee shop versions
  • Perfect for holiday gatherings or cozy nights in
  • Uses simple ingredients you likely have on hand
  • Customizable with toppings and flavor adjustments

structured_content.content: I remember the first time I made this hot cocoa for my family during a snowstorm. We gathered around the fireplace, sipping our mugs and sharing stories, and it quickly became a cherished tradition.

• Main ingredient: Whole milk works best for a creamy texture, but you can substitute with almond or oat milk for a dairy-free version.
  • Key seasonings/flavoring agents: Peppermint extract adds a refreshing note; look for pure extract for the best flavor.
  • Supporting ingredients: Heavy cream enhances richness and creates a velvety mouthfeel.
  • Equipment needed: A medium saucepan and whisk are essential for smooth mixing.

structured_content.content:
Preparation:
Measure out all ingredients before starting to ensure a smooth cooking process.
Cooking/Baking Process:
Combine ingredients in a saucepan over medium heat, whisking continuously until well mixed and heated through.
Finishing Touches:
Pour into mugs, top with whipped cream, and sprinkle with crushed peppermint for a festive touch.

upload.context: A step-by-step visual guide to making peppermint hot cocoa, highlighting the mixing and heating process.

note.label: You Must Know
note.content:
• Heat the mixture gently to avoid scorching the milk.
  • Don't skip the whisking; it ensures a smooth and creamy texture.
  • Look for a glossy finish on the cocoa to indicate it's ready.
  • Store leftovers in the fridge and reheat gently on the stove.

structured_content.content: This hot cocoa is not just a drink; it's a way to create memories. Sharing it with loved ones during the holidays brings warmth and joy that lasts long after the last sip.

Consider adding a pinch of cinnamon or a dash of vanilla extract for an extra layer of flavor. You can also experiment with different types of chocolate, like white chocolate or dark chocolate, for a unique twist.
Pair this hot cocoa with gingerbread cookies or a slice of peppermint bark for a festive treat. It also goes wonderfully with a cozy blanket and a good book!
For a vegan version, substitute dairy milk with coconut or almond milk and use coconut whipped cream. You can also make it spicy by adding a pinch of cayenne pepper for a surprising kick!

upload.context: A beautifully plated final dish of peppermint hot cocoa, garnished with whipped cream and peppermint candies, perfect for holiday celebrations.

note.label: Pro Tips
note.content:
• Use a high-quality cocoa powder for the best flavor.
  • Chill your mugs in the freezer before serving for a refreshing touch.
  • Time your cooking to ensure the cocoa is served warm and inviting.
  • Garnish with a sprig of mint for an elegant presentation.

structured_content.content: Don't hesitate to whip up this peppermint hot cocoa; it's a simple yet indulgent treat that will bring joy to your home. Enjoy the process and the delightful results!
